text: Jozef Špyrka (born 30 May 1999) is a Slovak football midfielder who currently plays for 2. liga club Železiarne Podbrezová. ==Club career== ===Tatran Prešov=== Špyrka made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for Tatran Prešov against ŽP Šport Podbrezová on 10 December 2016.PODBREZOVÁ VS. title: Jozef Špyrka
